title: Replace repeated travel images with unique visuals (APT reference)

acceptanceCriteria: All new images are placed as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The generated images are visually distinct (different destinations/scenes) and consistent in photographic style inspired by the reference site.

requirements.summary: Update Tour Packages page so each package card uses a unique image from generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx, the grid of package cards no longer references a single shared image for every card.
Each package card renders a unique image file from /assets/generated/.
The page still builds and routes correctly to booking when clicking “Book Now”.

file_operations.description: Replace the shared card image (/assets/generated/tour-packages-section-image.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png) with per-package unique images mapped to each package: frontend/public/assets/generated/tour-package-1-europe.realphoto.dim_800x600.png, tour-package-2-asia.realphoto.dim_800x600.png, tour-package-3-tropical.realphoto.dim_800x600.png, tour-package-4-safari.realphoto.dim_800x600.png, tour-package-5-south-america.realphoto.dim_800x600.png, tour-package-6-australia.realphoto.dim_800x600.png. Also update the featured section image to frontend/public/assets/generated/tour-packages-featured.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png while keeping the existing “Book Now” navigation intact.

requirements.summary: Update Honeymoon Offers page so each offer card uses its own unique image (no rotation by id).
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx, offer cards no longer use src={`/assets/generated/honeymoon-offer-${((offer.id - 1) % 3) + 1}.dim_800x600.png`}.
Each of the 6 honeymoon offer cards uses a different image file from /assets/generated/.

file_operations.description: Remove the 3-image rotation logic and assign each offer card a dedicated unique image using the new assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/honeymoon-offer-1.realphoto.dim_800x600.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/honeymoon-offer-6.realphoto.dim_800x600.png (one distinct file per offer). Keep existing booking navigation behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Ensure Home page section images are dedicated and not reused from About or Tour Guide pages.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx, the About section image is not the same asset used on frontend/src/pages/About.tsx.
In frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx, the Tour Guide section image is not the same asset used on frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx.

file_operations.description: Update Home page images to dedicated assets: set hero image to frontend/public/assets/generated/home-hero-banner.realphoto.dim_1600x900.png, set About section image to frontend/public/assets/generated/home-about-section.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png (not the About page’s about-section-image.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png), and set Tour Guide section image to frontend/public/assets/generated/home-tour-guide-section.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png (not the Tour Guide page’s tour-guide-section-image.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png).
